text: Dante by George Holmes, 1980. Past Masters is an Oxford University Press book series published from 1980. The series aims to provide a brief introduction to the ideas and beliefs of important thinkers from the past.Past Masters Oxford University Press USA. Retrieved 20 March 2015. A number of the books were subsequently republished in the Oxford Very Short Introductions series which began to replace the Past Masters series from around 1995. ==Publication history== Note: This list may not be complete. ISBNs given refer mainly to the paperback editions. ===1980s=== *Aquinas, A. J. P. Kenny, 1980. *Burke, C. B.
